entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
